title: Download the Audit Helm chart (on-premises)
content:
To download the Audit Helm chart to the control plane node, follow these steps:

  1. Log in to the control plane node and navigate to the directory where you want to download and install Audit service. In this directory, create a folder, for example, audit-2x.x. 
    mkdir audit-2x.x
cd audit-2x.x
  2. Download the Audit_Helm_Chart-2x.x.zip file from the Software Licenses and Downloads (SLD) website to audit-2x.x folder or the folder that you have created in Step 1.
  3. Unzip the package: 
    unzip Audit_Helm_Chart-2x.x.zip
  4. Untar the Audit chart package: 
    $tar -xvf audit-1.2.0+2x.x.x-xx.tgz
  5. Make sure you are in the audit-2x.x folder or the folder that you have created in Step 1. Copy the Helm chart and the sample files by using the following commands: 
    cp audit-helm-chart/audit/charts/*.tgz .
cp audit-helm-chart/audit/samples/* .
